00018 #ifndef __INET_MODULEACCESS_H
00019 #define __INET_MODULEACCESS_H

00021 #include <omnetpp.h>
00022 #include "INETDefs.h"

00031 INET_API cModule *findModuleWherever(const char *name, cModule *from);
00032 
00039 INET_API cModule *findModuleWhereverInNode(const char *name, cModule *from);
00040 
00047 INET_API cModule *findModuleSomewhereUp(const char *name, cModule *from);
00048 
00053 template<typename T>
00054 class ModuleAccess
00055 {
00056      // Note: MSVC 6.0 doesn't like const char *N as template parameter,
00057      // so we have to pass it via the ctor...
00058   private:
00059     const char *name;
00060     T *p;
00061   public:
00062     ModuleAccess(const char *n) {name = n; p=NULL;}
00063     virtual ~ModuleAccess() {}
00064 
00065     virtual T *get()
00066     {
00067         if (!p)
00068         {
00069             cModule *m = findModuleWhereverInNode(name, simulation.getContextModule());
00070             if (!m) opp_error("Module (%s)%s not found",opp_typename(typeid(T)),name);
00071             p = check_and_cast<T*>(m);
00072         }
00073         return p;
00074     }
00075 
00076     virtual T *getIfExists()
00077     {
00078         if (!p)
00079         {
00080             cModule *m = findModuleWhereverInNode(name, simulation.getContextModule());
00081             p = dynamic_cast<T*>(m);
00082         }
00083         return p;
00084     }
00085 };
00086 
00087 #endif
